title: Mobile Legends Adventure Tier List
description: Discover the best heroes in Mobile Legends Adventure with our comprehensive tier list. Find out which characters rank in S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier to optimize your team and dominate the game.
heading: Mobile Legends Adventure Tier List
introText: Discover the best heroes in Mobile Legends Adventure with our comprehensive tier list. Find out which characters rank in S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier to optimize your team and dominate the game.

data.itemDescription: Exceptional AoE damage and crowd control make her a top-tier hero
